entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Yarmouth
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:54 AM AST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -9.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Yarmouth Airport 10:00 AM AST Sunday 26 February 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -9.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.7 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 61 %
Wind Chill: -18
Dewpoint: -15.7°C
Wind: ESE 23 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Light snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this afternoon then light snow. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 17 this morning and minus 5 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Amount 20 cm except 10 cm inland. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: A few flurries. High minus 3.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the morning then clearing. Blowing snow over exposed areas in the morning. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near noon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 11 except minus 5 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 11 except minus 5 along parts of the coast. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Sunday 26 February 2023
